alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Chemung and southeastern Steuben Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 622 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Big Flats, or near Corning, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elmira, Corning, Southport, Big Flats, Horseheads, Elmira Heights, Hornby, South Corning, Wellsburg and West Elmira. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 46 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
